title: Print, ca. 1788
inscribed:
Imprinted from lower left to lower left center: Unre Cineraire d'Agathe oriental/qui se voit au Museum de Vatican/a cote un poignard antique//Aubert P. fecit

Imprited lower center: Vase de Composition pose sur un Autel Antique qui/qui se voit a la Ville 

Imprinted from lower right: Les medallions sont d'apres des Pierres precieuse de la Gallerie de Florence. L'Urne renverse est de marbre au Museum du Vatican.
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: At center is a large vase with snake handles flanked by a smaller urn on the left and a smaller medallion and urn on the right

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, ca. 1788.
ca. 1788. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-228-2.
